Outlook.noActionsAvailable: You have no actions available for this context.
Outlook.pathInfoSaveDescription: It's a folder in space Documents where your attachment will be saved.
Outlook.saveAttachmentDescription: Save attachment of the message in documents of selected space
Outlook.cancelSaveAttachmentDescription: Don't save attachment of the message
Outlook.savedAttachment: Your files successfully saved in space
Outlook.enterFolderNameAndCreate: Provide a name for new folder and click Add button.
Outlook.pathInfoDescription: It's a folder in space Documents where your attachment will be saved.
Outlook.addAttachmentDescription: Attach selected documents to the message
Outlook.cancelAddAttachmentDescription: Cancel adding attachments to the message
Outlook.addedAttachment: Documents successfully attached to your message
Outlook.convertToStatusDescription: Current message can be converted to a post in activity stream. By default it will go your user stream. If you'll choose target space then it will appear as selected space activity.
Outlook.targetSpaceDescription: If selected, it's a space where this message will be posted in activity stream.
Outlook.activityTitleDescription: This text will be an activity title in the stream
Outlook.activityTextDescription: It's activity text make from your email message
Outlook.convertedToStatus: Your message was successfully converted to an activity status
Outlook.convertToStatusError: Error converting message to activity stream post
Outlook.convertedToUserActivity: Your message successfully posted in personal activity stream
Outlook.convertedToSpaceActivity: Your message successfully posted in {SPACE_NAME} activity stream

messages.folderHasNoPath: Error selecting folder - path not found. Please reload page.
messages.nothingSavedTryAgain: Nothing was saved. Please submit form again or contact administrator.
messages.gettingTokenError: Error getting access token for mail server
messages.attachmentNotSelected: Attachment not selected. Select at least an one and then submit form again.
messages.menuNameUndefined: Menu name undefined. Please contact administrator.
messages.youDontHaveSpaces: You are not a member of any space.
messages.convertToStatusError: Error converting message to activity status.
